Question 7 
 
Velocity of flow is proportional to the first power of hydraulic gradient in Darcy’s law. This law is 
applicable to 
 
(A) transitional flow in porous media

GATE 2020 
 [Forenoon Session]
 
Civil Engineering
PAGE
9

(B) laminar flow in porous media
(C) laminar as well as turbulent flow in porous media
(D) turbulent flow in porous media
 
(B)

Question 7 
 
Velocity of flow is proportional to the first power of hydraulic gradient in Darcy’s law. This law is 
applicable to 
 
(A) transitional flow in porous media

GATE 2020 
 [Forenoon Session]
 
Civil Engineering
PAGE
9

(B) laminar flow in porous media
(C) laminar as well as turbulent flow in porous media
(D) turbulent flow in porous media
 
(B)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Darcy’s law is applicable only for laminar flow in porous medium.
Hence, the correct option is (B).
